longBusinessSummary.0: CEAT Limited manufactures and sells automotive tires, tubes, and flaps in India and internationally. The company offers rubber tires and tubes for scooters, bikes, three wheelers, cars, buses, LCVs, trucks, and tractors. CEAT Limited also exports its products to approximately 110 countries. The company was formerly known as CEAT Tyres of India Limited and changed its name to CEAT Limited in 1990. CEAT Limited was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
